tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RecruitmentData (
  candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
  hiring_manager VARCHAR(50),
  application_date DATE,
  interview_date DATE,
  job_title VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  application_source VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE RecruitmentData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    application_date DATE,
    recruitment_stage VARCHAR(50),
    interview_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InterviewFeedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
    interviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    interview_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    overall_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_data (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
    application_date DATE,
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    application_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE interview_schedule (
    interview_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    interview_date DATE,
    interviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    interview_result VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE hiring_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_notes TEXT,
    overall_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE RecruitmentData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR,
  application_date DATE,
  interview_date DATE,
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE InterviewFeedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_id INT,
  feedback_given_by VARCHAR,
  feedback_date DATE,
  feedback_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE InterviewSchedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interview_date DATE,
  interviewer_name VARCHAR,
  interview_duration INTERVAL,
  feedback_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE RecruitmentMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  hiring_rate DECIMAL,
  retention_rate DECIMAL,
  feedback_completion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_name VARCHAR(50),
  job_title VARCHAR(50),
  application_date DATE,
  interview_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE interview_feedback (
  interview_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT,
  interviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
  interview_date DATE,
  rating INT,
  feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
  job_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  job_title VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  experience_required INT
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_skills (
  candidate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  skill_name VARCHAR(50),
  proficiency_level VARCHAR(20),
  certification VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT
);
